segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the activity happening near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, leaning backwards quite a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, reaching into a cookie jar in the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is definitely inside, probably grabbing a fistful of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even holding a plate with his other hand, perhaps to collect the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool doesn't decide to tip over right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's positioned awkwardly on the floor, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookies, he doesn't seem to care about the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me incredibly nervous for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard kitchen floor would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really tell him to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
